scripts.deploy:prod: if [ $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) = "main" ]; then yarn build && vercel --prod; else echo "You need to be on the main branch to deploy to prod."; fi
scripts.deploy:staging: if [ $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) = "staging" ]; then yarn build && vercel; else echo "You need to be on the staging branch to deploy to staging."; fi
